resources.string: Ferdi needs to gather 500 coins in order to reach his friends and have a beer. But there are thugs lurking that want to prevent that. Your job is to help Ferdi get through!
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
Ferdi died…\n but that\'s OK because you have a new HighScore!\n LET\'S CELEBRATE!
Ferdi died because of you! Maybe you should just..go away!
Ferdi lives!\nHe\'s havin\' a beer with his friends! Get one yourself, you earned it…
Congratulations! You won and Ferdi is safe...
